original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard. At one time,

original: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /

original: de nas mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na lha mdog bzang po zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der srong ste phyin nas /
analyzed: de nas mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na lha mdog bzang po zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der srong ste phyin nas /
translated: Then, just before midnight, a god of beautiful appearance approached the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
translated: bowed his head at the feet of the Blessed One,

original: phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /

analyzed: de nas lha de'i mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
translated: Then, by the power of that god, the entire Jeta Grove was filled with a great light.

original: de nas de'i tshe lha des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe lha des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
translated: Then, at that time, that god spoke these verses:

analyzed: ha la ha la'i dug gang lags //

analyzed: 'dod chags ha la ha la'i dug /

analyzed: tshul khrims dam pa rnams kyi nor //

analyzed: de dag 'jig rten bslus pa yin //

analyzed: dbang phyug dam pa de gang lags //

analyzed: rtag tu rnam par brgyan pa gang //

analyzed: mtho ba tsams gang lags bka' stsal gsol //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //

analyzed: 'dod chung bde bar shes par bya //
translated: “Know that having few desires is happiness.

analyzed: chog shes dbang phyug dam pa yin //

original: phung po med pa'i bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: phung po med pa'i bde ba'i mchog /
translated: And the supreme bliss of the absence of aggregates.🔽” The gods asked:

original: lhas gsol pa; sdug la mi phan de gang lags //
analyzed: lhas gsol pa; sdug la mi phan de gang lags //

analyzed: phan yang mi sdug gang zhig lags //

analyzed: gnod pa bgyid pa'i nad gang lags //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //

analyzed: 'dod pa sdug kyang mi phan pa //

analyzed: thar pa phan mi sdug pa //
translated: Liberation is beneficial but not pleasant,

original: 'dod chags gnod pa med pa'i nad //
analyzed: 'dod chags gnod pa med pa'i nad //
translated: Attachment is the disease without harm,

original: sman pa'i mchog gcig sangs rgyas yin //
analyzed: sman pa'i mchog gcig sangs rgyas yin //
translated: And the supreme medicine is the Buddha.🔽” The gods asked:

analyzed: gang gis mtho ris mchi mi 'gyur //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //

analyzed: lhas gsol pa /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

translated: By what is the world liberated?🔽By what is it that, when abandoned,
